constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 161 (Friday, September 17, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. PERRY:
H.R. 5286.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Artide I, Section VIII of the United States Constitution
[Page H4531]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Asia, the Pacific, Central Asia and Nonproliferation.

title: Protecting Americans from Corporate Human Rights Abusers Act
